data.title: Pyckles
data.name: Pyckles
data.description: A super lightweight interface to load spectra from the Pickles 1998 catalogue

evidence: "A super lightweight interface to load spectra from the Pickles 1998 catalogue" (library-style interface for others to use).
"Does nothing more than download a compiled FITS file with all the stellar spectra and allows the user to access these interactively with python." (directly provides scientific spectra data access).
